item.title: 美国最大的贸易往来暂时获得关税缓和
item.description: 得克萨斯州拉雷多的恐慌有所缓解，但时间已经再次滴答作响。【原文：The panic eased in Laredo, Texas, but the clock is already ticking again.】

item.title: 英国纸币印刷商考虑竞购整个公司，股价大涨
item.description: De La Rue Plc 的股价在伦敦交易中涨至近三年来的最高点，此前这家印钞公司称，在未具名买家与公司进行初步接洽后，公司正在考虑出售整个公司。【原文：Shares of De La Rue Plc rallied to a nearly three-year high in London trading after the banknote printer said it was considering selling the whole company following preliminary approaches from unnamed buyers.】

item.title: 特朗普关税可能导致美国房屋建造成本上升 2.9 万美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划有可能提高美国的房屋建造成本，使本已面临住房市场紧缩的美国人更加举步维艰。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff plans threaten to raise US home construction costs, making it even more difficult for Americans already facing a tight housing market.】

item.title: 欧盟国家集团就放宽天然气储存目标举行会谈
item.description: 由于担心高昂的价格使储存天然气变得无利可图，拥有该地区最大储量的一些欧洲国家就 2025 年后放宽加气目标的问题举行了早期非正式会谈。【原文：A group of European countries that hold the biggest reserves in the region have held early stage and informal talks about softening refilling targets after 2025 amid concerns that high prices are making it unprofitable to store gas.】

item.title: 哈格蒂助手卢克-佩蒂特被任命为财政部银行政策主管
item.description: 特朗普政府已任命共和党参议员比尔-哈格蒂（Bill Hagerty）的幕僚卢克-佩蒂特（Luke Pettit）担任美国财政部高级职务。【原文：The Trump administration has tapped Luke Pettit, a staffer for Republican Senator Bill Hagerty, for a senior role in the US Treasury Department.】

item.title: 中国对美国石油征收关税正值出口从峰值下滑之际
item.description: 中国对美国石油实施的第一轮制裁受到了冷遇，交易商们猜测此举不太可能影响美国的原油出口。【原文：The first round of Chinese sanctions to hit US oil were received with a whimper, and traders are speculating that the move is unlikely to rattle American exports of crude.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比获得 S&P 高级信用评级
item.description: 几天前，皇家加勒比游轮有限公司（Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.）在其最繁忙的订票期创下了创纪录的开端，S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）将其评级恢复为投资级。【原文：Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd. has returned to investment-grade status at S&P Global Ratings, days after the cruise operator posted a record start to its busiest booking period.】

item.title: 苹果首次推出邀请函应用程序，AppleCare 在订阅服务方面的变化
item.description: 苹果公司推出了一款用于创建活动邀请函的新应用程序，并对其 AppleCare+ iPhone 客户支持进行了调整，这是苹果公司为获得更多订阅收入而采取的更广泛举措的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc. rolled out a new app for creating event invitations and made changes to its AppleCare+ customer support for iPhones, part of a broader push to generate more subscription revenue.】

item.title: Meta 在史上最长连胜中增值 2350 亿美元
item.description: 由于投资者对这家社交媒体巨头的人工智能战略欢呼雀跃，Meta Platforms 公司股价有望连续第 12 个交易日上涨，创下有史以来最长连涨纪录。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. shares are on track to post a gain for a 12th consecutive session, their longest winning streak ever, as investors cheer the social media giant’s artificial intelligence strategy.】

item.title: 欧洲利率上扬势头减弱，投资银行家扛起大旗
item.description: 投资银行家再次成为欧洲贷款机构盈利的明星，因为他们从金融市场的波动中获益，弥补了利息收入预期放缓的影响。【原文：Investment bankers once again emerged as the stars in European lenders’ earnings as they benefited from volatility in financial markets, making up for an expected slowdown in interest income.】

item.title: 关税忧虑和美国经济强劲令美元短暂下跌
item.description: 交易员们打赌，鉴于美国经济相对强劲以及对贸易战风险的担忧挥之不去，周二美元的暴跌很可能是短暂的。【原文：Traders are wagering that Tuesday’s slump in the dollar will likely prove short-lived, given the backdrop of relative US economic strength and lingering worries around the risk of a trade war.】

item.title: 制裁能否迫使普京在乌克兰问题上让步？
item.description: 旨在惩罚俄罗斯入侵乌克兰的三年制裁未能迫使弗拉基米尔-普京总统进行和平谈判。【原文：Three years of sanctions aimed at punishing Russia for its invasion of Ukraine have failed to force President Vladimir Putin to negotiate for peace.】

item.title: KKR 资本市场部报告创纪录的 10 亿美元费用
item.description: 在结构性信贷交易增长的推动下，KKR & Co.为其投资组合公司和其他公司安排融资的业务去年的年费创下新高。【原文：KKR & Co.’s business of arranging financing for its portfolio companies and other firms reported record annual fees last year, driven by growth in structured-credit transactions.】

item.title: 拉马福萨就有关南非的 "错误信息 "向马斯克发表讲话
item.description: 总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）进行了交谈，在此之前，这位出生于南非的亿万富翁与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）一起批评了南非新的土地征用法。【原文：President Cyril Ramaphosa spoke with Elon Musk after the South African-born billionaire joined President Donald Trump in criticizing the country’s new land-expropriation law.】

item.title: 万斯将出席巴黎人工智能峰会，强调特朗普的优先事项
item.description: 据一位熟悉副总统万斯计划的人士透露，他将出席下周在巴黎举行的人工智能峰会。【原文：Vice President JD Vance will attend a summit on artificial intelligence in Paris next week, according to a person familiar with his plans, a trip that will highlight the administration’s focus on the rapidly developing industry.】

item.title: 微策略公司的财务赌局因新股交易而受挫
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc.’s seemingly limitless moves to raise capital for its Bitcoin purchases have run into their first obstacle.】

item.title: 交易员赌英国央行 6 月加息至 5%，寻求 700 万英镑的发薪日
item.description: 一位交易员押注英国央行将在 6 月前加息，尽管市场普遍预测英国决策者将在本周的会议上下调基准借贷成本。【原文：One trader is betting on Bank of England interest-rate hikes by June, even though UK policy makers are widely predicted to cut benchmark borrowing costs at their meeting this week.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺降至760万，为9月以来最低
item.description: 美国 12 月份职位空缺降幅超过预期，创三个月新低，与劳动力市场逐步放缓的趋势一致。【原文：US job openings fell in December by more than forecast to a three-month low, consistent with a gradual slowdown in the labor market.】

item.title: 巴拿马考虑取消与香港公司的港口协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴拿马正在权衡是否要取消与经营巴拿马运河附近港口的香港公司的合同，这可能是为了化解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于对抗中国在这条关键水道周围的影响力的威胁而做出的让步。【原文：Panama is weighing whether to cancel its contract with the Hong Kong-based company that operates ports near the Panama Canal, according to people with knowledge of the situation, a potential concession to defuse President Donald Trump’s threats about countering China’s influence around the key waterway.】

item.title: 亚马逊在魁北克裁员 1900 人后将面临法律诉讼
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）决定关闭其在加拿大魁北克省的所有七个仓库，并解雇 1900 多名工人，这一决定引发了受影响工会的法律诉讼。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s decision to close all seven of its warehouses in the Canadian province of Quebec and terminate more than 1,900 workers is prompting legal action from the affected union.】

item.title: 智利 NotCo 公司向卡夫亨氏移交北美业务
item.description: Startup NotCo SpA 公司首席执行官马蒂亚斯-穆希尼克（Matias Muchnick）告诉彭博社，该公司关闭了在纽约的办事处，卡夫亨氏公司现在将在美国和加拿大销售这家智利公司的产品，因为该公司正在努力实现盈利。【原文：Startup NotCo SpA closed its offices in New York and Kraft Heinz Co. will now sell the Chilean company’s products in the US and Canada as it struggles to become profitable, CEO Matias Muchnick told Bloomberg.】

item.title: 马斯克与 OpenAI 将就初创公司重组问题对簿公堂
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在加大力度阻止 OpenAI 重组为一家营利性公司，因为该公司从投资者那里获得了数十亿美元的资金，包括来自他的早期资助。【原文：Elon Musk is stepping up his efforts to block OpenAI from restructuring as a for-profit company after it received billions of dollars from investors, including early funding from him.】

item.title: 几内亚西芒杜项目运营第二年产量达到最高水平
item.description: 预计将于 12 月投产的巨型西芒杜铁矿石项目将在运营第二年实现最大产出。【原文：Guinea expects the giant Simandou iron-ore project, which is expected to begin production by December, to achieve maximum output by its second year of operation.】

item.title: 私募股权公司正在寻找遏制债权人权力的新方法
item.description: 私募股权公司正在寻找新的方法，以便在所投资公司陷入财务困境时对其进行更严格的控制。【原文：Private equity firms are finding new ways to keep a tighter grip on portfolio companies if they get into financial distress.】

item.title: 随着 2% 通胀目标的临近，欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦预计将进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，随着通胀接近目标，可能会有更多的降息措施。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said more interest-rate cuts are likely as inflation approaches its target.】

item.title: 据说迪拜将从建筑公司首次公开募股中寻求高达 5 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，迪拜将从 ALEC Engineering & Contracting LLC 公司的首次公开募股中寻求高达 5 亿美元的资金，因为迪拜正努力重振私有化进程。【原文：Dubai will seek up to $500 million from the initial public offering of ALEC Engineering & Contracting LLC, according to people familiar with the matter, as the emirate seeks to revive its privatization drive.】

item.title: 智能门铃是英国公共统计危机的罪魁祸首
item.description: 英国统计机构负责人将数据质量危机归咎于预算削减和视频门铃的普及。【原文：The head of the UK’s statistics agency has blamed budget cuts and the spread of video doorbells for a crisis around the quality of its data.】

item.title: ICG 向西班牙 KronosNet 公司注入 7500 万欧元新股
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Intermediate Capital Group Plc 已向第三方商业服务提供商 KronosNet 投资了新的股权。【原文：Intermediate Capital Group Plc has invested fresh equity into third-party business service provider KronosNet, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国石油公司因成本削减而暂停澳大利亚可再生燃料项目
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）正在推迟在其位于澳大利亚的前奎纳纳炼油厂厂址上生产可再生燃料的计划，与此同时，该公司内部正在开展更广泛的成本削减行动。【原文：BP Plc is pushing back plans to make renewable fuels on the site of its former Kwinana oil refinery in Australia, amid a broader cost-cutting drive within the company.】

item.title: 非洲独角兽公司 Flutterwave 将首次公开募股与初创企业实现盈利联系起来
item.description: Flutterwave 公司首席执行官表示，只有当这家非洲最大的支付初创企业实现盈利时，才会进行期待已久的首次公开募股。【原文：Flutterwave Inc.’s long-awaited initial public offering will only take place when Africa’s largest payments startup is profitable, its chief executive officer said.】
